p: Finally, given the high content of fatty acids in M. oleifera, it has been compared with other products rich in these components that are consumed fresh (avocado) or dried (nuts) ( Table 4). It should be noted that the dried leaves of M. oleifera far outweigh the avocado and walnut in terms of total omega-3 and the total content of polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFA).
